All Is Dust.flavor_text:
"The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

All Is Dust.oracle_text: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents they control.

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

+4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.

Indestructible

Wurmcoil Engine.oracle_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink

Ancient Stirrings.name: Ancient Stirrings
Ancient Stirrings.oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)
